content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>       <!-- JNLP File for Integrated Data Viewer -->       <jnlp          spec="1.0+"          codebase = "http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/idv/current/webstart/" href="IDV/idv.jnlp">         <information>           <title>Integrated Data Viewer 5.1 </title>           <vendor>Unidata</vendor>           <homepage href="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/idv/index.html"/>           <description>Integrated Data Viewer (IDV)</description>           <description kind="short">A tool for geoscientific analysis and visualization.         </description>          <icon href="IDV/idv.gif"/>          <offline-allowed/>         </information>         <resources>           <j2se version="1.6+" max-heap-size="1024m" java-vm-args="-XX:MaxPermSize=128m" />             <jar href="IDV/idv.jar"/>            <extension name="IDV Base" href="IDV/idvbase.jnlp"/>        </resources>        <resources os="Linux">             <property name="j3d.sharedctx" value="false"/>        </resources>        <application-desc main-class="ucar.unidata.idv.DefaultIdv"/>         <security>            <all-permissions/>        </security>       </jnlp>
